description:
After meeting her at the beach, Daigo realizes that he recognizes Desumi. Will the things he reveals affect her relationship with Fudo... or even Gelato 5 itself?!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est moi qui ai fait de Desumi Magahara un monstre
Desumi Magahara Is the Monster I Made
Desumi Magahara ist ein Monster, das ich erschaffen habe
Magahara Desumi wa Ore ga Umidashita Monster Nan Da
禍原デス美はオレが生み出したモンスターなんだ
